column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: Ambien CR works for me, however, I was looing for something more when I had a accident.  It helped w/ calming me down, and I now use intermittenly w/ Ambien CR.  Never together, and ALWAYS ensure that I will have 9-10 rest.  Usually I wake w/ 8-9 regardless of what I take.  I have more energy during the day, can exercise again, and am back to gardening/yard work!!  I was checking the site to see why my Dr. had prescribed it, since I'd forgotten.
